topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Deploy the DCN Subnet Patch

body.section:
This patch fixes an issue that causes Neutron subnet creation to fail when DHCP is set to No Gateway on the SharedMGMT subnet.
Notes:
This patch is not required for DCN 3.2R7 environments.
This patch is not required for the Denver topology.

section.p: To download the patch you need from the Software Updates and Licensing site, shown above:

ol.li: Select the required patch file (e.g.HCG 2.0 DCN004 Patch020 ) from the Downloads list and then click Download.

Un-tar the downladed files (compressed patch files with extension tar.gz and .tar) until the HCG-nuage-patch-management-gw and readme files are available. The HCG-nuage-patch-management-gw is inside the metadata/roles directory. The readme with the patch download contains information on files changed by these patches.The Software Licensing site lists and displays patch file names individually for all the three versions of HCG ( HCG_1.1, HCG_2.0 and HCG_2.1) under Software Specification and Download filename. Regardless of their version number, these files are referencing the same files as extracted in the readme.

Check if the MD5 checksum verification file is extracted along with the patch file.
For validating the integrity of the downloaded file, you can run the MD5 checksum verification on the downloaded patch file and verify if the fingerprint of the file matches the version available on the server.

Log into the lifecycle manager VM. ssh <lifecycle manager_VM_IP>
where: lifecycle manager_VM_IP is the CLM IP of the lifecycle manager. Locate the IP address for the lifecycle manager in the /root/infra-ansible-playbooks/group_vars/all file under hlm_clmstaticip field.
. Copy the complete folder HCG-nuage-patch-management-gw to the /var/hlm/clouds/<cloudname>/patches directory on lifecycle manager VM
Execute following command to apply patch: hlm patch -c <cloud-name> -n HCG-nuage-patch-management-gw -t <tier-to-apply>Example: hlm patch -c sac36 -n HCG-nuage-patch-management-gw -t BASE-CCP-T2
